name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。

Week 2  2/23  To practice the songs in the musical ”Mamma Mia!
Week 3  3/2   To practice the dialogues in ”Elizabeth: Part I & II”
Week 4  3/9   To practice the dialogues in ”A Good Year”
Week 5  3/16  To practice the dialogues in ”Elizabeth”
Week 6  3/23  To practice the dialogues in ”World Trade Center”
Week 7  3/30  To practice the dialogues in ”Looing for Mr. Right”

Week18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and participation in dialogue practices:  33%
2. A in-class oral presentation: 33%
(1) the summary of the plot,
(2) two sections of important dialogues from the work, and
(3) a list of useful expressions drawn from the work.
3. Final examination 33%
